abstract: British Defense Minister Liam Fox resigns abruptly after more than a week of damaging headlines about his personal and professional relationship with close friend Adam Werritty, who appeared to have brokered access to Fox for wealthy people; resignation is a major blow for Prime Min David Cameron and his Conservative Party.
snippet: Liam Fox resigned on Friday after days of searing headlines about revelations that he had given a close friend extensive access to his official activities.
lead_paragraph: Liam Fox resigned on Friday after days of searing headlines about revelations that he had given a close friend extensive access to his official activities.

headline.print_headline: British Defense Minister Resigns Over a Friend’s Political Access and Influence
headline.seo: Liam Fox, Britain’s Defense Minister, Resigns
